name: standards
schema: CREATE TABLE `standards` (`category` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `logo` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `standard_id` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `status` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `vendor` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `website` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
